00049 class MolrParams
00050 {
00052     public:
00053         
00055         MolrParams( MolrType molr_type,
00056                     LocationMethod loc_method,
00057                     const LcsQos& lcs_qos,
00058                     const ClientId& client_id,
00059                     const MlcNumber& mlc_number)
00060         {
00061             m_molr_params.molr_type = (T_MN_MOLR_TYPE) molr_type;
00062             m_molr_params.loc_method = (T_MN_LOC_METHOD) loc_method;
00063             m_molr_params.lcs_qos.horiz_accuracy = (byte) lcs_qos.m_horiz_accuracy;
00064             m_molr_params.lcs_qos.vertic_accuracy = (byte) lcs_qos.m_vert_accuracy;
00065             m_molr_params.lcs_qos.rsp_time_cat = (T_MN_RESPONSE_TIME_CATEGORY) lcs_qos.m_rsp_time_cat;
00066             memcpy(m_molr_params.client_id.A, &client_id, sizeof(ClientId));
00067             memcpy(m_molr_params.mlc_number.A, &mlc_number, sizeof(MlcNumber));
00068         }
00069 
00071         const T_MN_MOLR_REQ& GetMolrParams() const { return m_molr_params; }
00072         
00073 
00075     private:
00076 
00078         MolrParams();
00079 
00080 
00082     private:
00083 
00085         T_MN_MOLR_REQ m_molr_params;
00086         
00087 }; // MolrParams

00095 class InvokeId
00096 {
00098     public:
00099 
00101         InvokeId()
00102         { 
00103             ++m_invoke_id;
00104             if(m_invoke_id == 0) // 0 is an invalid InvokeId
00105                 ++m_invoke_id;
00106         }
00107 
00109         UINT16 GetInvokeId() const { return m_invoke_id; }
00110 
00111 
00113     private:
00114 
00116         static UINT16 m_invoke_id;
00117 
00118 }; // InvokeId

00124 struct MolrInfo : public Linkable<MolrInfo>
00125 {
00127     MolrInfo(   MolrType molr_type,
00128                 LocationMethod location_method,
00129                 const LcsQos& lcs_qos,
00130                 const ClientId& client_id,
00131                 const MlcNumber& mlc_number,
00132                 INT32 repeat_interval,
00133                 const Application* app,
00134                 const LcsProviderImplBase* provider)
00135                 : m_molr_type(molr_type), m_location_method(location_method), 
00136                 m_lcs_qos(lcs_qos), m_client_id(client_id), m_mlc_number(mlc_number),
00137                 m_repeat_interval(repeat_interval)
00138     {
00139         // Remove the constness
00140         m_app = (Application*) app;
00141         m_provider = (LcsProviderImplBase*) provider;
00142     }
00143 
00145     virtual ~MolrInfo()
00146     {
00147     }
00148 
00150     MolrType                m_molr_type;
00151     LocationMethod          m_location_method;
00152     LcsQos                  m_lcs_qos;
00153     ClientId                m_client_id;
00154     MlcNumber               m_mlc_number;
00155     INT32                   m_repeat_interval; 
00156     Application*            m_app;
00157     LcsProviderImplBase*    m_provider;
00158 
00159 
00161 private:
00162 
00164     MolrInfo();
00165 
00166 }; // MolrInfo

00172 struct MolrRepeatInfo : public MolrInfo
00173 {
00174     typedef MolrInfo Base;
00175 
00177     MolrRepeatInfo( MolrType molr_type,
00178                     LocationMethod location_method,
00179                     const LcsQos& lcs_qos,
00180                     const ClientId& client_id,
00181                     const MlcNumber& mlc_number,
00182                     INT32 repeat_interval,
00183                     const Application* app,
00184                     const LcsProviderImplBase* provider)
00185                     : Base( molr_type, location_method, lcs_qos, client_id,
00186                             mlc_number, repeat_interval, app, provider)
00187     {
00188         // Assign a unique invoke id to this request
00189         m_invoke_id = InvokeId().GetInvokeId();
00190 
00191         // Initialize the repeat MO-LR timer
00192         const UINT16 SEC_TO_MSEC = 1000;
00193         m_rep_timer.Init(m_invoke_id, m_repeat_interval * SEC_TO_MSEC);
00194     }
00195 
00197     virtual ~MolrRepeatInfo()
00198     {
00199         m_rep_timer.Stop();
00200     }
00201 
00203     UINT16 m_invoke_id;
00204     LcsRepeatTimer m_rep_timer; // To know when it's time to repeat the location request 
00205 
00206     
00208 private:
00209 
00211     MolrRepeatInfo();
00212 
00213 }; // MolrRepeatInfo
00214 
00219 struct MtlrInfo : public Linkable<MtlrInfo>
00220 {
00222     MtlrInfo(BYTE ti_pd, LcsNotificationType notif_type, const LcsProviderImplBase* provider)
00223             : m_ti_pd(ti_pd), m_notif_type(notif_type)
00224     {
00225         // Remove the constness
00226         m_provider = (LcsProviderImplBase*) provider;
00227 
00228         // Assign a unique invoke id to this request
00229         m_invoke_id = InvokeId().GetInvokeId();
00230 
00231         // Initialize the timer
00232         const UINT16 MTLR_TIMEOUT = 8400; // in msec
00233         m_lcs_timer.Init(MtlrTimer, MTLR_TIMEOUT, m_provider);
00234     }
00235 
00237     virtual ~MtlrInfo()
00238     {
00239         m_lcs_timer.Stop();
00240     }
00241 
00243     BYTE m_ti_pd;
00244     UINT16 m_invoke_id;
00245     LcsNotificationType m_notif_type;
00246     LcsTimer m_lcs_timer;
00247     LcsProviderImplBase* m_provider;
00248 
00249 
00251 private:
00252 
00254     MtlrInfo();
00255 
00256 };
